channel.title: Fear School Taiwan Cars Ella on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Fear School Taiwan Cars Ella on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: how soon is tomorrow
item.description: Today is weird. I worked from 9 to 5 twice in 24 hours. That is a lot of work. I am totally of the school of thought that you should always pace yourself. 16 hours with a 3 hour break isn’t really pacing myself. But whatever - it is the same sxhedule I sometimes have with going out and work - and I don’t complain then. Heh. Today I got a letter from my friend ella from taiwan.
